title: 66 Amazon Prime Day Deals Under $100 As Curated By A Broke Shopping Editor
description: Good quality doesn’t have to be expensive—this week, anyway…
author: Julia Harrison
excerpt: The best Prime Day deals under $100 on tech, furniture, and decor are here. Get in fast—these five-star products won't last long
text: All products featured on Architectural Digest are independently selected by our editors. However, we may receive compensation from retailers and/or from purchases of products through these links.Last updated 5:07 pm EST. Finding the best Prime Day deals under $100 is a sort of art form. There’s a lot of sleuthing involved, price checking, scanning drop down menus for material, quality, warranty policies, but I’ve toiled long and hard to find budget shoppers things to love during Amazon’s first mega shopping holiday of the year—now longer than ever and slated to run through July 11. I’ve got mid-century furniture finds, cordless vacuums, a plethora of tech deals lined up, as well as some personal favorites on big discount (Peugeot, Malin + Goetz, Boll & Branch).This week during Amazon’s Prime Day event, I’ve been combing through markdowns on our favorite home appliances (hello Dyson and Samsung) and accessories (xoxo Staub) to round out this list. More deals are dropping every hour, so keep your eyes peeled throughout the week in case you missed anything. At the moment, our staff is seeing some of the best prices on best-selling cookware, kitchen appliances (including air fryers), home decor, and tech gadgets like Bluetooth speakers, robot vacuums, and air purifiers—all for half the price of a haircut in New York City. I recommend checking back frequently if you don’t see your dream items on sale—these deals change daily, and sometimes even more often than that.Featured in this articleAn Editor-Vetted Sheet SetMellanni Luxury Hotel Sheet SetRead moreWhat We’re All Here ForApple AirPods 4Read moreA Chef's Best FriendKitchenAid Ribbed Soft Silicone Oven Mitt (Set of 2)Read moreRead more about our Amazon favorites and peruse our top choices for Prime Day deals on furniture, mattresses, sheets, and bath towels too.Furniture Deals Under $100Scouting out the best Amazon Prime furniture that’s both stylish and affordable can feel like an endless scroll, which is why we’ve gone ahead and done the work for you here. Whether you’re looking for a budget-friendly home office upgrade in the form of a sturdy office chair, some extra storage, or an affordable mid-century option, we've got you covered.Yamazaki Home Freestanding Coat RackWe reach for Yamazaki anytime there’s a space in need of streamlined, design-conscious storage. This coat rack lends a subtle, Japandi touch to your entryway.Armen Living Jaguar Mid Century Modern Dining Accent ChairAn annual bestseller, this ’70s-inspired dining chair makes mid-century affordable.Winsome Groveland Dining TableSimple, square, dark wood never disappoints. This two-seater looks classic and functional as a small apartment’s main dining table or the breakfast nook of a bigger space. It’s also the perfect size for poring over puzzles.Sweetcrispy Ergonomic Desk ChairWork from home has its perks, but it also has its back aches. This ergonomic desk chair is beloved by over 5,000 customers for its lumbar support and consequential pain relief.GLOBE 61000053 Floor LampThere’s something about a pleated shade that instantly cozies up a room—it’s the sort of classic style that ensures a lived-in feeling in your design.Yaheetech Mid-Century Modern Upholstered ChairFortunately, you don’t need to spend a fortune on mid-century modern furniture. Popular Amazon brand Yaheetech makes this button-tufted accent chair with polyester upholstery or faux leather, and all but one style is on sale for Prime Day for a whopping 58% off.Yaheetech Mid-Century Modern ArmchairBouclé is an on-trend, soft-to-the-touch fabric we can’t get enough of, and this upholstered chair is 25% off off for Prime Day. If you’re more into faux leather, some of those options are even further discounted.Bedding and Sleep Accessories Under $100If we do say so ourselves, we’re Amazon bedding experts at this point, with ample testing in the comforter, duvet cover, pillow, and mattress categories. We’re excited to see some of our favorites are on sale, like high-quality linens from Coyuchi and Boll & Branch, who both ranked highly in our best sheets roundup. This Casper pillow two-pack also sneaks in under the $100 mark, which contributor Madeleine Luckel reviews as meeting the “sweet spot in terms of its firmness” and being “thick enough to work perfectly as a stand-alone sleep piece.”Mellanni Luxury Hotel Sheet SetRated the “best cooling sheets on a budget,” this has long been an editor pick for the best Amazon sheets. Contributor Kristi Kellogg calls them “lightweight and airy,” and verifies they hold up after numerous washes.Casper Original Pillow, Two PackA two-pack of Luckel’s top-rated pillows is available at 25% off. Her glowing review is in good company, with 11,000 other reviewers singing its praises.Boll & Branch Down Alternative PillowWe’re such big fans of B&B we did a whole write-up on their best deals for Prime Day, but their products have made many a best-of list on AD, and I found these down alternatives to be proper down dupes, genuinely impossible for me to tell the difference.Coyuchi Crinkled Percale PillowcaseCoyuchi’s high-quality percale ensures a long, fit-free, frizz-free sleep, gentle on your skin and hair, and cool to the touch all night long.Hatch Restore 3 Sunrise Alarm ClockPhone-free bedtime feels a little less daunting with this sunrise alarm, which is—of course—programmable using an app that can customize your wind down routines, gentle wake alarms, as well as function as a sound machine and ambient lighting. Paired with these lavender pills, I’m hitting a very comfortable 8 hours.MZOO Zero Eye Pressure Sleep Eye MaskVouched for by a night-shift nurse (my sister), these are cheaper and less bulky than blackout curtains, and work just as well (if not better!). You need only to scroll a centimeter to find night shift nurse recommended ear plugs, also.Loop Quiet Customizable Fit Ear PlugsWhile the selling point of these ear plugs is meant to be their aesthetic superiority to other options, I find the selling point is simply that they work, and they’re $17. Those of us with singing roommates are willing to spend a lot more.ZXNZX Premium Strip Tapes (Set of 30)Tik Tok tells us mouth tape not only keeps us from snoring, but italso improves jaw definition. It’s a $20 experiment, anyway, and cheaper than orthognathic surgery.Guohaoi Knitted Weighted Throw BlanketA weighted blanket does the work of 100mg of Melatonin, if you ask me, and this knitted version is much more aesthetically pleasing than some other options on market that are bit too grid-like for my taste.Decor Under $100While it may take some digging, Amazon’s home decor section has some impressive gems—including midcentury silhouettes, modern details, and Bauhaus designs. Cozy up your space with a new area rug from an editor-approved brand or upgrade your fruit bowl game.Loloi II Jocelyn 06 Area RugThis is a Turkish rug hack for less than $75. And leave your pink anxiety at the door—it’s warm, inviting, and brings an unexpected and stylish base color to your living room setup.Qepeety 3-Layer Scandinavian Pendant LightThis design feels perfectly suited to a Scandinavian kitchen or Danish dining room. The multi-tiered pendant is reminiscent of Louis Poulsen’s PH5, a long-time designer essential. The vibrant colorways allow for the pendant to make a small but impactful statement.Cloudnola Station Silent Wall ClockThis retro wall clock works as a vintage hack without pushing the price point.Loloi x Chris Loves Julia Judy RugLoloi’s latest splashy collaboration (following others with Brigette Romanek, Jeremiah Brent, and Joanna Gaines) features kilim-inspired stripes that are perfectly suited to bohemian or farmhouse spaces.Vatima Hyacinth Wicker BasketA few of these, and suddenly your pantry, your shoe pile, your trove of random mail, has some newfound self-respect.Jute Rope Laundry Hamper Basket by YoudenovaSame goes for your laundry pile.BEAUTYPEAK Arch Floor MirrorExpand a small bedroom with this modern, curved, and impactful mirror.Creative Co-Op Round Hammered Metal BowlFill with artichokes and this looks 30 times more expensive than it is.Safavieh La Jolla RugMaximalists have a lot to love with this bohemian La Jolla rug—the deep blues add a vibrant design element, and keep any minimalist space from appearing too stark.Tech Deals Under $100Apple wireless earbuds with noise cancellation, video doorbells, and Alexa-enabled Amazon devices are all discounted right now, with the retailer offering some of the lowest prices we’ve seen on lots of other gems too. Now’s your chance to save on all sorts of smart home improvement gems—no coupon needed.Anker 622 Magnetic BatteryType B folks have met their match with this portable magnetic battery.Amazon Echo Pop Alexa SpeakerThe Amazon Echo Pop is down nearly 50%—users particularly love that even at its small size it makes a big sound impact. You can control smart home devices through the Alexa capability and voice activation modes on this model—plus, it’s so little and cute.Apple AirPods 4Oh, nothing but a life-changing item at a 30% discount.Bose SoundLink Flex Portable Bluetooth SpeakerBose coughed up just one deal that met the under $100 criteria, but at least it’s a good one—this is a waterproof portable speaker, meaning it’s perfect for lake hangs, poolside gatherings, beach days, when it inevitably gets splashed or spilled upon.Magcubic Mini Projectorwith WiFi and BluetoothThis would take a dorm room from strictly functional to the social spot of the semester. Same goes for small apartments. And let’s face it: Jurassic World Rebirth is going to be a much better experience on a big(ger) screen than a laptop.Anker Soundcore 2 Portable Bluetooth SpeakerI am however, loyal to this Anker Soundcore speaker that I’ve had for the better part of 5 years and while it’s now weaker to hold a charge, I’ve found it extremely portable, durable, offering great sound quality and in its heyday had a battery life so long I managed to lose the charger for months in between.Amazon Fire TV 2.0 Speaker SoundbarThis slim sound bar keeps from being an eye-sore on your console, you nearly forget it’s there, and the three dimensional surround sound means you can blast Love Island drama to your heart’s content.Sony WH-CH520 Wireless HeadphonesFor those who take their listening seriously, these will signal your playlists are something to snoop on.Soundcore by Anker P20i True Wireless EarbudsAt half their original price, these budget-friendly wireless earbuds from Anker might make nice backups should anything happen to your go-tos.Blink Video DoorbellNever miss another package again with this video doorbell that will alert you to any movement on your doorstep.Tapo by TP-Link 2K QHD Indoor/Outdoor Security CameraHere's an outdoor security camera to ensure nothing goes awry while you're at work or on vacation. More than 11,000 customers are happy with its quality, value, and ease of use.Vacuums and Cleaning Devices Under $100These cleaning deals may not be the most glamorous, but they’re helpful for maintaining a spotless (or at least less messy) home with a little more ease. Right now, Bissell’s stick vacuums are deeply discounted, as well as Black + Decker’s cordless vacuum options with loads of five-star ratings.Shark Rocket Ultra-Light Corded Bagless VacuumAmazon’s number one best seller in upright vacuum cleaners is 60% off for the sales event. This model has all the necessary accoutrements: HEPA filter, pet hair pickup, powerful suction, converts to a hand vacuum for smaller cleans, and comes with every sort of brush head you can imagine for handling every sort of mess.Bissell CleanView Compact Upright VacuumThis is a particularly compact model for a corded vacuum, and we love that it features the very necessary hands-free emptying cartridge.Ayontin Cordless Handheld VacuumAt 75% off, this is at least worth a shot, but over 200 reviewers have your back—it’s an efficient model with a respectable suction power. This little guy can hold its weight in debris, and a washable HEPA filter means you can really keep things clean—including the vacuum.Black & Decker BHFEA520J Cordless Stick VacuumIt’s hard to find a functional cordless vacuum that comes in under $100, but this beloved model from Black & Decker does the trick. 45 minutes of runtime and LED footlights make for an easy, efficient clean.Bissell Mini Little Green MachineSurely you’ve seen it and considered it before—this portable upholstery cleaner that senior commerce editor Nashia Baker calls the mini version “a lifesaver with removing spills—even thick messes like mustard from my carpet” in her comprehensive review.Black + Decker Dustbuster AdvancedClean Handheld VacuumThis dustbuster from Black & Decker is an Amazon bestseller year after year for its powerful suction, portability, powerful battery life, and efficiency. It’s racked up over 100,000 positive reviews, which feels like a warranty in-and-of itself.Kitchen Accessories Under $100Maybe you’ve finally decided to try on the air fryer lifestyle, or maybe you’re simply in the mood to upgrade your food processor—either way Amazon’s delivering with their seemingly endless supply of kitchen deals. The site is stacked with dozens of deals on top-rated air fryers, plus every brand of blender, coffee maker, slow cooker, and toaster oven under the sun.KitchenAid Ribbed Soft Silicone Oven Mitt (Set of 2)While cotton oven mitts look cute, it takes only a few uses before they look war-torn, and another few before they’ve thinned out to burn-watch territory. These silicone mitts ensure your hands stay safe—plus they’re easy to clean.JoyJolt Layla White Wine Glasses (Set of 4)These glasses are a favorite of our commerce director Rachel Fletcher, who notes that she’s always on the lookout for attractive, affordable glassware options that can survive everyday slipups. “This set of wine glasses from JoyJolt absolutely checks those boxes and then some. They’re dishwasher safe, under $30 for a set of four, and the look is far more elegant than what you might expect from a Prime Day pick.”Keurig K-Express Coffee MakerThis OG Keurig is nearly half off, meaning you can have a quick, efficient, hands-free cup for half the price. These Pike Place Roast K-Cups punch way above their weight.Bodum Pour Over Coffee MakerHere’s an editor-approved coffee maker beloved by two of staffers (one being me). Both Fletcher and myself are fans of this device that makes a far better cup than any $400 competitor I’ve tried. It’s almost disappointing how elite a $50 coffee maker can be against options 30 times its price point.Alpha Grillers Instant Read Meat ThermometerMy $16 insurance policy and a great gift for anyone who just can’t seem to shake their chicken ick.Staub Ceramic Rectangular Baking Dishes (Set of 3)A necessary set for a burgeoning or vetted chef. Staub never steers us wrong.Le Creuset Stoneware Mini Round CocotteAnother top-ranking gift choice—these 8-ouncers come in handy far more than you’d expect, perfect for confiting, dessert for one, and a cute vessel for a chimichurri or yogurt sauce.Ninja Pro 4-in-1 Air FryerIf there’s one thing Amazon Prime Day is good for, it’s testing out appliances new to you that have been all the rave for half a decade. If you’ve been slow to approach the air fryer train, 30% off might turn your head on this beloved model from Ninja. Did you know these things can dehydrate also?Best Gifts Under $100While shopping the best Prime Day deals for yourself, it’s worth tossing in a few discounted goodies for upcoming birthdays, baby showers, engagements, solstice celebrations, and what have you. Future you will appreciate the effort, we can almost guarantee it. We’ve pulled a few standouts, from Sabre flatware to chunky knitted throws and coffee pots that show it’s the thought—and everyday functionality—that counts. We’ve even snuck a few picks from our list of tabletop favorites.Martha Stewart Highbrook Glass Cake StandThis jade cake stand looks way more expensive than $32—you can thank Martha Stewart for that one. In fact, it looks Marie Antoinette-esque, who is notoriously pro eating cake.Kate Spade Luna Nesting Bowls (Set of 8)This makes an excellent first-apartment gift—retro, trendy, exceedingly useful and dishwasher- safe.Ridhi Dark Salmon Pink TableclothA hand block-printed tablecloth brings a grounding element to your tablescape, and this floral print in particular is an impactful way to brighten your dining room as well as make it feel welcoming.Peugeot u’Select Salt & Pepper Mill SetI hailed these in our editor’s picks roundup, calling them an essential for the “Nickey Kehoe kitchen.” The set is nearly 50% off and lasts you—I can attest, having grown up with the same set—for at least 20 years before the screws loosen to the point of no return.Ziljj Bedside Water Carafe SetHydration gets a stylish upgrade with this carafe, which works particularly well bedside as both a reminder to drink water and an elegant decoration element.Sabre Paris Tortoise Cutlery (Set of 5)One of our all time favorite silverware brands has a little discount running during Prime Day and it’s making us wonder if we should change things up for our next dinner party. While most of Sabre’s sets are full price right now, this lovely five-piece tortoise setting is marked down.Fragrance Under $100Long live Amazon Prime Day 2025 for offering up our favorite candle brands and scents at quite healthy discounts. Ritual candle buyers know how expensive the habit of perpetually-burning ambience can be, so we’re glad to see discounts up to 50% off our top contenders from Malin & Goetz, Boy Smells, Salt + Stone, and more.Malin+Goetz Tomato CandleMay the era of the tomato candle never end. Joining the ranks of Loewe and Flamingo Estate, Malin & Goetz makes a competitive tomato scent as well. There’s no better way to experience summer all year long.Boy Smells Hinoki Fantôme CandleCardamom, hinoki, and smoked amber make for a sultry and outdoorsy scent profile in this release from Boy Smells.Salt & Stone Black Rose & Vetiver CandleFans of their deodorant will be totally unsurprised at the quality of these musky and divine candles from Salt + Stone. The brand never fails to create a vibey, ambient, and sexy backdrop with their scent profiles.LAFCO New York Classic Retreat CandleLafco combines macha, palo santo and clary sage for a scent that feels deeply reminiscent of inhaling on the California coastline.Maison Louis Marie No.04 Soy Wax CandleMaison Louis Marie’s most popular scent is floral but musky—it makes me think of things like a grass-stained eyelet skirt, a dark blush, a wild rose bush...it’s the perfect all-day scent to have burning as it’s subtle and sweet but never saccharine.P.F. Candle Co. Golden Coast Room & Linen SprayP.F. Candle always comes through with reliable, laidback scents with earthy base notes like teakwood, tobacco, oak. This scent in particular feels cozy and outdoorsy.Air Purifiers Under $100Combatting airborne dust, dander, and allergens is much easier when you have a top-of-the-line filtration device. And though clean air is a must during allergy and wildfire seasons, we don’t think it should come at great expense to your wallet. In addition to countless highly rated air purifiers for larger spaces, we found multiple Prime Day sale buys you can snag for under $100, including some of our top picks from Levoit.BLUEAIR 511i Max Air PurifierComing in just under $100,, this air purifier has garnered the love and attention of 13,000 reviewers who praise this model for its efficiency and aesthetics. This model protects against allergens like pollen and pet dander, smoke, dust, and does it all from a place of covert, inoffensive design.Levoit Core Mini Air PurifierFor a room that could use a little extra boost of fresh air, this tabletop purifier packs a punch, with three-stage filtration that works on cleaning air within a 254 square feet space.LEVOIT Air Purifier for Home Bedroom, Smart WiFi Alexa ControlA little more robust than its mini counterpart, this Levoit is available for over 20% off, with coverage up to 678 feet—that’s a lot of power for a still-little purifier.GermGuardian Air Purifier60,000 reviewers found this efficient at filtering air in spaces up to 743 square feet, banishing odors, pollens, and other allergens.FAQsDo Amazon Prime Day deals change every day?Yes! Each day, Amazon updates their list of deals to include more products, though some discounts fall off (and each day we’re updating our articles with the best Amazon Prime Day deals we’ve spotted so far).We’d encourage you not to wait on your purchase, especially high-ticket items, as these are often temporary deals.What is Amazon Prime Day? (And what to shop now)The epic sales event known as Amazon Prime Day is your time to score limited-time deals on all the home upgrades you’ll need for the rest of the season. The mega retailer's annual shopping event for Prime members offers steep discounts on everything from robot vacuums and Amazon devices to mattresses and couches. It’s also a solid time to find top tech tech deals like Kindles, Apple airtags, Wi-Fi enabled security cameras and more. Prime Day is also known for its Lightning Deals—spotlight items that are on sale for a super limited time—so we recommend watching this space so you won’t miss out.When is Amazon Prime Day?This year, Amazon announced a super-sized version of its annual Prime Day, slated for July 8th through July 11th. This means Prime members will have double the usual time to scoop up discounts on high-end tech, splurge worthy furniture, and upgraded bedding (though we can’t guarantee deals will last through the entire sales period so don’t dilly dally). In anticipation of the sale, the AD shopping team has been busy rounding up all of the best deals we’re spotting ahead of Prime Day—from deals under $100 to our favorite on-sale furniture finds.
html:
All products featured on Architectural Digest are independently selected by our editors. However, we may receive compensation from retailers and/or from purchases of products through these links.

Last updated 5:07 pm EST. Finding the best Prime Day deals under $100 is a sort of art form. There’s a lot of sleuthing involved, price checking, scanning drop down menus for material, quality, warranty policies, but I’ve toiled long and hard to find budget shoppers things to love during Amazon’s first mega shopping holiday of the year—now longer than ever and slated to run through July 11. I’ve got mid-century furniture finds, cordless vacuums, a plethora of tech deals lined up, as well as some personal favorites on big discount (Peugeot, Malin + Goetz, Boll & Branch).

This week during Amazon’s Prime Day event, I’ve been combing through markdowns on our favorite home appliances (hello Dyson and Samsung) and accessories (xoxo Staub) to round out this list. More deals are dropping every hour, so keep your eyes peeled throughout the week in case you missed anything. At the moment, our staff is seeing some of the best prices on best-selling cookware, kitchen appliances (including air fryers), home decor, and tech gadgets like Bluetooth speakers, robot vacuums, and air purifiers—all for half the price of a haircut in New York City. I recommend checking back frequently if you don’t see your dream items on sale—these deals change daily, and sometimes even more often than that.

Featured in this article

Read more about our Amazon favorites and peruse our top choices for Prime Day deals on furniture, mattresses, sheets, and bath towels too.

Furniture Deals Under $100

Scouting out the best Amazon Prime furniture that’s both stylish and affordable can feel like an endless scroll, which is why we’ve gone ahead and done the work for you here. Whether you’re looking for a budget-friendly home office upgrade in the form of a sturdy office chair, some extra storage, or an affordable mid-century option, we've got you covered.

Yamazaki Home Freestanding Coat Rack

We reach for Yamazaki anytime there’s a space in need of streamlined, design-conscious storage. This coat rack lends a subtle, Japandi touch to your entryway.

Armen Living Jaguar Mid Century Modern Dining Accent Chair

An annual bestseller, this ’70s-inspired dining chair makes mid-century affordable.

Winsome Groveland Dining Table

Simple, square, dark wood never disappoints. This two-seater looks classic and functional as a small apartment’s main dining table or the breakfast nook of a bigger space. It’s also the perfect size for poring over puzzles.

Sweetcrispy Ergonomic Desk Chair

Work from home has its perks, but it also has its back aches. This ergonomic desk chair is beloved by over 5,000 customers for its lumbar support and consequential pain relief.

GLOBE 61000053 Floor Lamp

There’s something about a pleated shade that instantly cozies up a room—it’s the sort of classic style that ensures a lived-in feeling in your design.

Yaheetech Mid-Century Modern Upholstered Chair

Fortunately, you don’t need to spend a fortune on mid-century modern furniture. Popular Amazon brand Yaheetech makes this button-tufted accent chair with polyester upholstery or faux leather, and all but one style is on sale for Prime Day for a whopping 58% off.

Yaheetech Mid-Century Modern Armchair

Bouclé is an on-trend, soft-to-the-touch fabric we can’t get enough of, and this upholstered chair is 25% off off for Prime Day. If you’re more into faux leather, some of those options are even further discounted.

Bedding and Sleep Accessories Under $100

If we do say so ourselves, we’re Amazon bedding experts at this point, with ample testing in the comforter, duvet cover, pillow, and mattress categories. We’re excited to see some of our favorites are on sale, like high-quality linens from Coyuchi and Boll & Branch, who both ranked highly in our best sheets roundup. This Casper pillow two-pack also sneaks in under the $100 mark, which contributor Madeleine Luckel reviews as meeting the “sweet spot in terms of its firmness” and being “thick enough to work perfectly as a stand-alone sleep piece.”

Mellanni Luxury Hotel Sheet Set

Rated the “best cooling sheets on a budget,” this has long been an editor pick for the best Amazon sheets. Contributor Kristi Kellogg calls them “lightweight and airy,” and verifies they hold up after numerous washes.

Casper Original Pillow, Two Pack

A two-pack of Luckel’s top-rated pillows is available at 25% off. Her glowing review is in good company, with 11,000 other reviewers singing its praises.

Boll & Branch Down Alternative Pillow

We’re such big fans of B&B we did a whole write-up on their best deals for Prime Day, but their products have made many a best-of list on AD, and I found these down alternatives to be proper down dupes, genuinely impossible for me to tell the difference.

Coyuchi Crinkled Percale Pillowcase

Coyuchi’s high-quality percale ensures a long, fit-free, frizz-free sleep, gentle on your skin and hair, and cool to the touch all night long.

Hatch Restore 3 Sunrise Alarm Clock

Phone-free bedtime feels a little less daunting with this sunrise alarm, which is—of course—programmable using an app that can customize your wind down routines, gentle wake alarms, as well as function as a sound machine and ambient lighting. Paired with these lavender pills, I’m hitting a very comfortable 8 hours.

MZOO Zero Eye Pressure Sleep Eye Mask

Vouched for by a night-shift nurse (my sister), these are cheaper and less bulky than blackout curtains, and work just as well (if not better!). You need only to scroll a centimeter to find night shift nurse recommended ear plugs, also.

Loop Quiet Customizable Fit Ear Plugs

While the selling point of these ear plugs is meant to be their aesthetic superiority to other options, I find the selling point is simply that they work, and they’re $17. Those of us with singing roommates are willing to spend a lot more.

ZXNZX Premium Strip Tapes (Set of 30)

Tik Tok tells us mouth tape not only keeps us from snoring, but italso improves jaw definition. It’s a $20 experiment, anyway, and cheaper than orthognathic surgery.

Guohaoi Knitted Weighted Throw Blanket

A weighted blanket does the work of 100mg of Melatonin, if you ask me, and this knitted version is much more aesthetically pleasing than some other options on market that are bit too grid-like for my taste.

Decor Under $100

While it may take some digging, Amazon’s home decor section has some impressive gems—including midcentury silhouettes, modern details, and Bauhaus designs. Cozy up your space with a new area rug from an editor-approved brand or upgrade your fruit bowl game.

Loloi II Jocelyn 06 Area Rug

This is a Turkish rug hack for less than $75. And leave your pink anxiety at the door—it’s warm, inviting, and brings an unexpected and stylish base color to your living room setup.

Qepeety 3-Layer Scandinavian Pendant Light

This design feels perfectly suited to a Scandinavian kitchen or Danish dining room. The multi-tiered pendant is reminiscent of Louis Poulsen’s PH5, a long-time designer essential. The vibrant colorways allow for the pendant to make a small but impactful statement.

Cloudnola Station Silent Wall Clock

This retro wall clock works as a vintage hack without pushing the price point.

Loloi x Chris Loves Julia Judy Rug

Loloi’s latest splashy collaboration (following others with Brigette Romanek, Jeremiah Brent, and Joanna Gaines) features kilim-inspired stripes that are perfectly suited to bohemian or farmhouse spaces.

Vatima Hyacinth Wicker Basket

A few of these, and suddenly your pantry, your shoe pile, your trove of random mail, has some newfound self-respect.

Jute Rope Laundry Hamper Basket by Youdenova

Same goes for your laundry pile.

BEAUTYPEAK Arch Floor Mirror

Expand a small bedroom with this modern, curved, and impactful mirror.

Creative Co-Op Round Hammered Metal Bowl

Fill with artichokes and this looks 30 times more expensive than it is.

Safavieh La Jolla Rug

Maximalists have a lot to love with this bohemian La Jolla rug—the deep blues add a vibrant design element, and keep any minimalist space from appearing too stark.

Tech Deals Under $100

Apple wireless earbuds with noise cancellation, video doorbells, and Alexa-enabled Amazon devices are all discounted right now, with the retailer offering some of the lowest prices we’ve seen on lots of other gems too. Now’s your chance to save on all sorts of smart home improvement gems—no coupon needed.

Anker 622 Magnetic Battery

Type B folks have met their match with this portable magnetic battery.

Amazon Echo Pop Alexa Speaker

The Amazon Echo Pop is down nearly 50%—users particularly love that even at its small size it makes a big sound impact. You can control smart home devices through the Alexa capability and voice activation modes on this model—plus, it’s so little and cute.

Apple AirPods 4

Oh, nothing but a life-changing item at a 30% discount.

Bose SoundLink Flex Portable Bluetooth Speaker

Bose coughed up just one deal that met the under $100 criteria, but at least it’s a good one—this is a waterproof portable speaker, meaning it’s perfect for lake hangs, poolside gatherings, beach days, when it inevitably gets splashed or spilled upon.

Magcubic Mini Projectorwith WiFi and Bluetooth

This would take a dorm room from strictly functional to the social spot of the semester. Same goes for small apartments. And let’s face it: Jurassic World Rebirth is going to be a much better experience on a big(ger) screen than a laptop.

Anker Soundcore 2 Portable Bluetooth Speaker

I am however, loyal to this Anker Soundcore speaker that I’ve had for the better part of 5 years and while it’s now weaker to hold a charge, I’ve found it extremely portable, durable, offering great sound quality and in its heyday had a battery life so long I managed to lose the charger for months in between.

Amazon Fire TV 2.0 Speaker Soundbar

This slim sound bar keeps from being an eye-sore on your console, you nearly forget it’s there, and the three dimensional surround sound means you can blast Love Island drama to your heart’s content.

Sony WH-CH520 Wireless Headphones

For those who take their listening seriously, these will signal your playlists are something to snoop on.

Soundcore by Anker P20i True Wireless Earbuds

At half their original price, these budget-friendly wireless earbuds from Anker might make nice backups should anything happen to your go-tos.

Blink Video Doorbell

Never miss another package again with this video doorbell that will alert you to any movement on your doorstep.

Tapo by TP-Link 2K QHD Indoor/Outdoor Security Camera

Here's an outdoor security camera to ensure nothing goes awry while you're at work or on vacation. More than 11,000 customers are happy with its quality, value, and ease of use.

Vacuums and Cleaning Devices Under $100

These cleaning deals may not be the most glamorous, but they’re helpful for maintaining a spotless (or at least less messy) home with a little more ease. Right now, Bissell’s stick vacuums are deeply discounted, as well as Black + Decker’s cordless vacuum options with loads of five-star ratings.

Shark Rocket Ultra-Light Corded Bagless Vacuum

Amazon’s number one best seller in upright vacuum cleaners is 60% off for the sales event. This model has all the necessary accoutrements: HEPA filter, pet hair pickup, powerful suction, converts to a hand vacuum for smaller cleans, and comes with every sort of brush head you can imagine for handling every sort of mess.

Bissell CleanView Compact Upright Vacuum

This is a particularly compact model for a corded vacuum, and we love that it features the very necessary hands-free emptying cartridge.

Ayontin Cordless Handheld Vacuum

At 75% off, this is at least worth a shot, but over 200 reviewers have your back—it’s an efficient model with a respectable suction power. This little guy can hold its weight in debris, and a washable HEPA filter means you can really keep things clean—including the vacuum.

Black & Decker BHFEA520J Cordless Stick Vacuum

It’s hard to find a functional cordless vacuum that comes in under $100, but this beloved model from Black & Decker does the trick. 45 minutes of runtime and LED footlights make for an easy, efficient clean.

Bissell Mini Little Green Machine

Surely you’ve seen it and considered it before—this portable upholstery cleaner that senior commerce editor Nashia Baker calls the mini version “a lifesaver with removing spills—even thick messes like mustard from my carpet” in her comprehensive review.

Black + Decker Dustbuster AdvancedClean Handheld Vacuum

This dustbuster from Black & Decker is an Amazon bestseller year after year for its powerful suction, portability, powerful battery life, and efficiency. It’s racked up over 100,000 positive reviews, which feels like a warranty in-and-of itself.

Kitchen Accessories Under $100

Maybe you’ve finally decided to try on the air fryer lifestyle, or maybe you’re simply in the mood to upgrade your food processor—either way Amazon’s delivering with their seemingly endless supply of kitchen deals. The site is stacked with dozens of deals on top-rated air fryers, plus every brand of blender, coffee maker, slow cooker, and toaster oven under the sun.

KitchenAid Ribbed Soft Silicone Oven Mitt (Set of 2)

While cotton oven mitts look cute, it takes only a few uses before they look war-torn, and another few before they’ve thinned out to burn-watch territory. These silicone mitts ensure your hands stay safe—plus they’re easy to clean.

JoyJolt Layla White Wine Glasses (Set of 4)

These glasses are a favorite of our commerce director Rachel Fletcher, who notes that she’s always on the lookout for attractive, affordable glassware options that can survive everyday slipups. “This set of wine glasses from JoyJolt absolutely checks those boxes and then some. They’re dishwasher safe, under $30 for a set of four, and the look is far more elegant than what you might expect from a Prime Day pick.”

Keurig K-Express Coffee Maker

This OG Keurig is nearly half off, meaning you can have a quick, efficient, hands-free cup for half the price. These Pike Place Roast K-Cups punch way above their weight.

Bodum Pour Over Coffee Maker

Here’s an editor-approved coffee maker beloved by two of staffers (one being me). Both Fletcher and myself are fans of this device that makes a far better cup than any $400 competitor I’ve tried. It’s almost disappointing how elite a $50 coffee maker can be against options 30 times its price point.

Alpha Grillers Instant Read Meat Thermometer

My $16 insurance policy and a great gift for anyone who just can’t seem to shake their chicken ick.

Staub Ceramic Rectangular Baking Dishes (Set of 3)

A necessary set for a burgeoning or vetted chef. Staub never steers us wrong.

Le Creuset Stoneware Mini Round Cocotte

Another top-ranking gift choice—these 8-ouncers come in handy far more than you’d expect, perfect for confiting, dessert for one, and a cute vessel for a chimichurri or yogurt sauce.

Ninja Pro 4-in-1 Air Fryer

If there’s one thing Amazon Prime Day is good for, it’s testing out appliances new to you that have been all the rave for half a decade. If you’ve been slow to approach the air fryer train, 30% off might turn your head on this beloved model from Ninja. Did you know these things can dehydrate also?

Best Gifts Under $100

While shopping the best Prime Day deals for yourself, it’s worth tossing in a few discounted goodies for upcoming birthdays, baby showers, engagements, solstice celebrations, and what have you. Future you will appreciate the effort, we can almost guarantee it. We’ve pulled a few standouts, from Sabre flatware to chunky knitted throws and coffee pots that show it’s the thought—and everyday functionality—that counts. We’ve even snuck a few picks from our list of tabletop favorites.

Martha Stewart Highbrook Glass Cake Stand

This jade cake stand looks way more expensive than $32—you can thank Martha Stewart for that one. In fact, it looks Marie Antoinette-esque, who is notoriously pro eating cake.

Kate Spade Luna Nesting Bowls (Set of 8)

This makes an excellent first-apartment gift—retro, trendy, exceedingly useful and dishwasher- safe.

Ridhi Dark Salmon Pink Tablecloth

A hand block-printed tablecloth brings a grounding element to your tablescape, and this floral print in particular is an impactful way to brighten your dining room as well as make it feel welcoming.

Peugeot u’Select Salt & Pepper Mill Set

I hailed these in our editor’s picks roundup, calling them an essential for the “Nickey Kehoe kitchen.” The set is nearly 50% off and lasts you—I can attest, having grown up with the same set—for at least 20 years before the screws loosen to the point of no return.

Ziljj Bedside Water Carafe Set

Hydration gets a stylish upgrade with this carafe, which works particularly well bedside as both a reminder to drink water and an elegant decoration element.

Sabre Paris Tortoise Cutlery (Set of 5)

One of our all time favorite silverware brands has a little discount running during Prime Day and it’s making us wonder if we should change things up for our next dinner party. While most of Sabre’s sets are full price right now, this lovely five-piece tortoise setting is marked down.

Fragrance Under $100

Long live Amazon Prime Day 2025 for offering up our favorite candle brands and scents at quite healthy discounts. Ritual candle buyers know how expensive the habit of perpetually-burning ambience can be, so we’re glad to see discounts up to 50% off our top contenders from Malin & Goetz, Boy Smells, Salt + Stone, and more.

Malin+Goetz Tomato Candle

May the era of the tomato candle never end. Joining the ranks of Loewe and Flamingo Estate, Malin & Goetz makes a competitive tomato scent as well. There’s no better way to experience summer all year long.

Boy Smells Hinoki Fantôme Candle

Cardamom, hinoki, and smoked amber make for a sultry and outdoorsy scent profile in this release from Boy Smells.

Salt & Stone Black Rose & Vetiver Candle

Fans of their deodorant will be totally unsurprised at the quality of these musky and divine candles from Salt + Stone. The brand never fails to create a vibey, ambient, and sexy backdrop with their scent profiles.

LAFCO New York Classic Retreat Candle

Lafco combines macha, palo santo and clary sage for a scent that feels deeply reminiscent of inhaling on the California coastline.

Maison Louis Marie No.04 Soy Wax Candle

Maison Louis Marie’s most popular scent is floral but musky—it makes me think of things like a grass-stained eyelet skirt, a dark blush, a wild rose bush...it’s the perfect all-day scent to have burning as it’s subtle and sweet but never saccharine.

P.F. Candle Co. Golden Coast Room & Linen Spray

P.F. Candle always comes through with reliable, laidback scents with earthy base notes like teakwood, tobacco, oak. This scent in particular feels cozy and outdoorsy.

Air Purifiers Under $100

Combatting airborne dust, dander, and allergens is much easier when you have a top-of-the-line filtration device. And though clean air is a must during allergy and wildfire seasons, we don’t think it should come at great expense to your wallet. In addition to countless highly rated air purifiers for larger spaces, we found multiple Prime Day sale buys you can snag for under $100, including some of our top picks from Levoit.

BLUEAIR 511i Max Air Purifier

Coming in just under $100,, this air purifier has garnered the love and attention of 13,000 reviewers who praise this model for its efficiency and aesthetics. This model protects against allergens like pollen and pet dander, smoke, dust, and does it all from a place of covert, inoffensive design.

Levoit Core Mini Air Purifier

For a room that could use a little extra boost of fresh air, this tabletop purifier packs a punch, with three-stage filtration that works on cleaning air within a 254 square feet space.

LEVOIT Air Purifier for Home Bedroom, Smart WiFi Alexa Control

A little more robust than its mini counterpart, this Levoit is available for over 20% off, with coverage up to 678 feet—that’s a lot of power for a still-little purifier.

GermGuardian Air Purifier

60,000 reviewers found this efficient at filtering air in spaces up to 743 square feet, banishing odors, pollens, and other allergens.

FAQs

Do Amazon Prime Day deals change every day?

Yes! Each day, Amazon updates their list of deals to include more products, though some discounts fall off (and each day we’re updating our articles with the best Amazon Prime Day deals we’ve spotted so far).We’d encourage you not to wait on your purchase, especially high-ticket items, as these are often temporary deals.

What is Amazon Prime Day? (And what to shop now)

The epic sales event known as Amazon Prime Day is your time to score limited-time deals on all the home upgrades you’ll need for the rest of the season. The mega retailer's annual shopping event for Prime members offers steep discounts on everything from robot vacuums and Amazon devices to mattresses and couches. It’s also a solid time to find top tech tech deals like Kindles, Apple airtags, Wi-Fi enabled security cameras and more. Prime Day is also known for its Lightning Deals—spotlight items that are on sale for a super limited time—so we recommend watching this space so you won’t miss out.

When is Amazon Prime Day?

This year, Amazon announced a super-sized version of its annual Prime Day, slated for July 8th through July 11th. This means Prime members will have double the usual time to scoop up discounts on high-end tech, splurge worthy furniture, and upgraded bedding (though we can’t guarantee deals will last through the entire sales period so don’t dilly dally). In anticipation of the sale, the AD shopping team has been busy rounding up all of the best deals we’re spotting ahead of Prime Day—from deals under $100 to our favorite on-sale furniture finds.
